params._invariantProxyAssets: The ordered invariant proxy assets corresponding to _pools, e.g., WETH for ETH-based pools

params._derivativeAmount: The amount of the derivative to convert

returns.underlyingAmounts_: The amount of each underlying asset for the equivalent derivative amount

getOwner().details: Ownership is deferred to the owner of the FundDeployer contract

returns.isSupported_: True if the asset is supported

removePools(address[]).details: Unlikely to be needed, just in case of bad storage entry

addPools(address[],address[]).notice: Adds Balancer pool info to the price feed

calcUnderlyingValues(address,uint256).notice: Converts a given amount of a derivative to its underlying asset values

getOwner().notice: Gets the owner of this contract

getPoolFactories().notice: Gets the stored pool factory addresses

getPoolInfo(address).notice: Gets the stored PoolInfo for a given pool

isSupportedAsset(address).notice: Checks if an asset is supported by the price feed

removePools(address[]).notice: Removes Balancer pools from the price feed
